bibl.title: Fringes and Aprons - Meroitic Clothing: An Update from Qasr Ibrim.
bibl.note: Textiles from a late Meroitic deposit [late 3rd or early 4th century AD]. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Fringes. - 3. Tapestry decoration. - 4. Embroidery. - 5. Clothing. - 6. Conclusion.

bibl.title: assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009.

bibl.seg: Wild Felicity, Fringes and Aprons - Meroitic Clothing: An Update from Qasr Ibrim.

Antoine De Moor and Cäcilia Fluck (Edd.), assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009 (Tielt, 2011) pp. 110-119, 19 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Textiles from a late Meroitic deposit [late 3rd or early 4th century AD]. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Fringes. - 3. Tapestry decoration. - 4. Embroidery. - 5. Clothing. - 6. Conclusion.
